Night Shift gets a good look at the strange figure and quicky decides that =
wheels are the way to stay.

" On second thought I'm keep'n my wheels.  Not=
h'n like those ta make a fast getaway on"

Rat Trap is relieved to hear Nig=
ht Shifts choice.

" Sounds good ta me.  But maybe ya just need a few more =
cilinders and a faw more horses in that engine of yours."

Night Shift chuc=
kles.

"yeah that would help.  Not a bad idea.  Now what in the name of Pri=
mus is that out there?"

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.
